ideas.body: The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

ideas.title: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text.
ideas.body: It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words

ideas.title: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority...
ideas.body: If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.

ideas.title: The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested.
ideas.body: Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.
